sentence: Pro-democracy Republicans like Reps. Adam Kinzinger and Liz Cheney have become pariahs, censured and shunned and attacked for daring to refute the Big Lie and hold Trump accountable for helping foment the unrest that led to the Jan. 6 attack.
author: Andy Kroll
title: They Helped Save Democracy  and Are Being Tormented for It

sentence: Trending News U.S. proposes limiting consideration of public benefits for green cards Russia expels U.S. embassy's second-in-command amid Ukraine tensions All members of Congress can attend State of the Union address, with restrictions Kevin McCarthy backs Liz Cheney's primary challenger Harriet Hageman Information warfare expert says U.S. is finally countering Russia at its own game Eleanor Watson CBS News reporter covering the Pentagon.
author: Eleanor Watson
title: Reports of sexual assault at U.S. military academies rose over the past year
